item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Chenjie Zhang. I am a new post-graduate student at the University of Southern California, starting in the fall of 2024, majoring in Computer Science - Game Development. I have experience with Unity and Unreal Engine, and I have built several projects using these platforms. When participating in game jams, I like to use the code name “MIUNO”. This name, pronounced /muno/, is inspired by the code name MONA from Persona 5.
